name: places/ChIJEyIAT6NYwokRUM4m-FbGnB0
formattedAddress: 1324 Lexington Ave # 3, New York, NY 10128, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1324 Lexington Ave # 3, New York, NY 10128-1145, USA

editorialSummary.text: Snug, sister-owned shop offering bras & underwear along with shapewear, hosiery & lingerie.

originalText.text: I desperately needed to replace my Marie Jo bras after having given birth almost 2 years ago. But I never seem to have the time to drive out to a store. I guess the universe was looking out for me. During a work trip to NYC, I happened to walk down Lexington Avenue to catch a train and then a bus to the airport. I almost walked by Allure, but all the bras caught my eye. Walking into the store, the owner asked me a few questions and picked several bras for me to try on. And they fit great! I was in and out of the store in less than 15 minutes. Professional and competent service. Marie Jo bra prices must have increased since the last time I purchased, but these are high quality bras that fit well, look good, and are comfortable --- so you get what you pay for. Great store and if I lived in NYC, this would be my go to spot for lingerie.

originalText.text: Best lingerie shoppe in all of NYC. Small business. Family owned. Sisters who care. You will always find something that works perfectly. Never disappoints.

text.text: Best lingerie shoppe in all of NYC. Small business. Family owned. Sisters who care. You will always find something that works perfectly. Never disappoints.

originalText.text: great experience shopping at Allure for a bra. the owners were knowledgeable, knew my bra size immediately, and found me something that worked and looked great.  will go back for my next bra!

text.text: great experience shopping at Allure for a bra. the owners were knowledgeable, knew my bra size immediately, and found me something that worked and looked great.  will go back for my next bra!

originalText.text: came into this store to buy last minute spanx for my wedding- within 5 min and top service, the right questions and without a try-on i got the best pair that went perfectly with my outfit. impeccable! highly recommend

text.text: came into this store to buy last minute spanx for my wedding- within 5 min and top service, the right questions and without a try-on i got the best pair that went perfectly with my outfit. impeccable! highly recommend

originalText.text: I brought my friend here because she needed to get a fitting. The woman that works here (or owns it? Not sure) was such an expert that without needing to even grab measuring tape, she picked 3 bras for my friend, and my friend found a perfect fit within 5 minutes.
